item.title: kerasgenerator v0.0.1 Released!

Currently, it is still in a very early development stageâ€“it is even only have 2 functions right now ğŸ˜. But it is my first experience in developing a package, and I really canâ€™t resist to publish it to test some features from devtools, usethis, and pkgdown.
